name: The Atlantic Passage
description:
The year is 1568: Sail away to new shores, but be aware of the dangers of the high sea!

Use the arrow keys or A and D to move left and right. Avoid getting hit. Try collecting bottles of rum to boost your moral.

Once the moral on your ship is gone, the game is over.

This game was made for the 5th Extra Credits Game Jam with the theme "Passage".

Tools used: Unity Engine, MS Visual Studio, Aseprite, sfxr, Guitar Pro 5, Magix Music Maker

Ambient sounds taken from freesounds.org:

https://freesound.org/people/INNORECORDS/sounds/456899/

https://freesound.org/people/xserra/sounds/161700/

https://freesound.org/people/thanvannispen/sounds/30284/
